message.body: Hi lovey! Hope you had a great thanksgiving! Quick question: what's your mailing address? Also, I miss you and we should catch up soon! Love you!
Miss you let's definitely catch up soon - when will you be up north again!?!
Thank you! And yes let's! I'll be in ma for a few days over xmas...not sure of exact plans but maybe we could meet up? Either way, phone date soon! It's been way too long!
I know! If your free tonight give me a call girlie! If not we can plan for another time
